name: Autem (Demo)
description:
Autem is a light platforming / walking simulator about a priest and his past self manifested as a ghostly kid as they climb a tower while they atone and accept their sins.

Project is old and BROKEN, not working properly, been warned. You HAVE to Alt+F4 to quit at a certain point.

WASD to move

Spacebar to jump

Stand still to pass though blue objects

Design and development - Alejandro Pulido

Art and Design - @RocioSalado

Art and Design - @RayDoksley
